segments.text: Quite a few people are laid off these days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . It is not easy for them to find another job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: University graduates have difficulty finding a job too . There seems to be more and more competition in the job market
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is strange that some people are quitting their jobs in order to find a better one . What do you think ? Do you want to quit your job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Not now . I think I'll try to keep this one .
segments.speaker: S1
